name: Pastry Baker
description:
Team Name

MEGALODON games

Imagine yourself as a Baker. Not an ordinary baker but a very special baker. Try to satisfy all the wishes of customers. Enjoy!

Use Arrows for rolling dough left/right

Use E to cut dough

Use W to increase moving speed

Use Space to try make another cookie

Have a nice game!

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission
